meta_text: NOR BU'I THEM SKAS_The Jewel Staircase, a Joy to Those with Faith—A Biography granted from the Holy Lips of that Glorious Lama, the Holy One; Great Spiritual Friend to All; the Wise and Accomplished One, who has Relinquished All Worldly Activities; Abbot of Nomchi; the One Whose Holy Name I Utter only with Difficulty--Lobsang Shedrup, Good and Glorious_LCANG LUNG AARYA PAndI TA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN (1770-1845)
